data.title: OLTL Kelli Maroney & Marsha Clark as Tina Lord
data.text:


They were both in and out so quick that you didn't really miss

anything. From what I vaguely remember is that Kelli Maroney's Tina

was as dumb as rocks, in that vapid cheerleader sort of way. A real

interchangable "blond type" who viewers immediately rejected as Tina.

She was there for about six months (reportedly quitting because Paul

Rauch kept making passes at her.) Marsha Clark replaced her at years

end, but if you blinked you missed her. She was only there for about a

month or two. Very un_Tina-like. Sophisticated and composed. In Feb.

'85, the show managed to lure back Evans, who knew how to play the part

right.

"Tamara Stowers" <sumrb...@aol.com> wrote in message

news:1141526160.4...@i39g2000cwa.googlegroups.com...



I too am very spotty on OLTL, its been years since I really paid any

attention to it. I have enough trouble sitting still for GH, but I remember

a Tina, bottle blonde, really cute again in the ditzy blonde cheerleader

type. But I cannot for the life of me figure out who played her then---she

had two small children with Cort, both blonde and small---about 4-7 years

old. I looked at all the people they have listed as playing Tina and none of

them was the Tina I remember--they have the history as:

Andrea Evans (1978 to 1981, 1985 to 1990)

Nancy Frangione (1980; temporary)

Kelli Maroney (1984 to 1985)

Marsha Clark (1985)

Karen Witter (1990 to 1994)

Krista Tesreau (1994 to 1997)

But I looked at all of them and none of them match the Tina I recall. Did

someone else play her that they didn't list?

Thanks!

Laura



Dena Higley seems to be deliberately not returning her. I think

they're scared to cast another actress to play the role and in the

meantime are waiting on AE to finally agree to come back. Stupid

really. Meanwhile as more years past since the last time Tina was in

town, her necessity becomes less and less.

Stone wrote:



Remember, we're talking about the same idiots in charge who

killed off Gabrielle, killed and un-killed Al/Michael, sent

Max off into nowhere, did the Colson-is-gay train wreck....

Need I go on?

Nyssa, who wonders how some people keep their jobs
